GV00maitrs_pu:2628_13: iṣṭakābhir ṛṣaya ārdhnuvaṃs tā ṛddhīr ṛdhnoti yasyaitā upadhīyante 'thaitāḥ saṃyato
GV00maitrs_pu:2628_14: reto vā etat sicyate yad agniś cīyate yad etā upadhīyante retasaḥ siktasya saṃyatyai
GV00maitrs_pu:2628_15: lokaṃ pṛṇa chidraṃ pṛṇety eṣā vā achidreṣṭakā achidrā vā etayā citayaś cīyanta indrāgnī
GV00maitrs_pu:2628_16: tvā bṛhaspatir ity ojo vai vīryam indrāgnī ojasā vā etad vīryeṇāgniś cīyate tā asya
GV00maitrs_pu:2628_17: sūdadohasā iti paruṣiparuṣy eva rasaṃ dadhāti somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayā ity annaṃ vai
GV00maitrs_pu:2628_18: pṛśny annam evāvarunddhe janman devānāṃ viśā ity āha prajātyā eva triṣv ā rocane
GV00maitrs_pu:2628_19: diva iti savanāni vai tṛṇi rocanāni savanacitam evainam akar anuṣṭub vā eṣā vāg vā
GV00maitrs_pu:2628_20: anuṣṭup prāṇo vai vāg yad eṣā sarvā iṣṭakā anusaṃcarati tasmāt prāṇaḥ sarvāṇy aṅgāny
GV00maitrs_pu:2628_21: anusaṃcaraty āgneyī vā eṣā varṇena svena vā etac chandasāgniś cīyate nādhvaryuḥ san
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_0: utsannayajño vā eṣa yad agniś cityaḥ ko ha tad veda yad etasya kriyate yan nāśvinau
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_1: vai devānāṃ bhiṣajā akḷptasya kalpayitārau yad etā āśvinīr upadhīyante 'kḷptasya
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_2: kḷptyai pañcopadadhāti pāṅkto yajño yāvān eva yajñas tam ālabdhātho yāvān eva yajñas
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_3: tam acīkḷpad athaitā āśvinīr ṛtavyā anūpadhīyante retase vā etat siktāya ṛtūn upādhāt
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_4: tasmāt sarveṣv ṛtuṣu reto hitaṃ tasmāt sarvān ṛtūn reto 'nuprajāyate 'thaitā ṛtavyā
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_5: vāyavyā anūpadhīyante tasmāt sarvān ṛtūn vāyur anvāvarīvarty athaitā vāyavyā apasyā
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_6: anūpadhīyante tasmāt paśavo nānāvratāḥ santo 'pa evābhi savratāś catasraḥ purastād
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_7: upadadhāti caturvidhaṃ hi śiraḥ prāṇaś cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ vāṅ mūrdhanvatībhiḥ sādayati
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_8: mūrdhanyo 'sānīti pañcapañcābhitā upadadhāti paśoḥ savīryatvāyātho sāyatanatvāya
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_9: tasmāt paśuḥ paścād varīyāñ śroṇimattaras tasmād u prāṅ saṃhāna indrāgnī avyathamānām
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_10: iṣṭakāṃ dṛṃhataṃ yuvam ity antarikṣaṃ vā eṣā citir antarikṣam imāḥ prajā indrāgnī
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_11: vai devānām ojobhṛtav ojo vīryam indrāgnī ojo vā etad vīryaṃ madhyataḥ prajānāṃ dhīyate
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_12: 'thaitā diśyā devā vai svargaṃ lokam āyaṃs te diśā ākramanta tā avlīyanta tā etābhir
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_13: adṛṃhan yad etā upadhīyante diśāṃ dhṛtyai pañcopadadhāti pāṅkto yajño yāvān eva yajñas
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_14: tam ālabdha daśaitāḥ purastāt sādayati daśākṣarā virāḍ virāṭ khalu vai cakṣur jyotiś
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_15: chandasāṃ cakṣur vā etaj jyotiḥ purastāt paśor dadhāti tasmād idaṃ purastāc cakṣur
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_16: atho annaṃ vai virāḍ annaṃ vā etan mukhato dadhāti mā chandaḥ pramā chandaḥ pratimā
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_17: chandā itīyaṃ vai māntarikṣaṃ pramāsau pratimemān eva lokān upadhatte 'tho devachandasāni
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_18: vā etāni devachandasāny evopadhatte dvādaśadvādaśābhitā upadadhāti tat ṣaṭtriṃśat
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_19: ṣaṭtriṃśadakṣarā bṛhatī bṛhatī khalu vai chandasāṃ svārājyam ānaśe gachati svārājyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_20: yasyaitā upadhīyante paśavo vai bṛhatī paśavo madhyamā citis tasmād etasyāṃ cityām
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_21: etā upadhīyanta ādityadhāmāno vā uttare prāṇā aṅgirodhāmāno 'dhare mūrdhāsi rāḍ iti
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_22: ya uttare prāṇās tān etābhir dādhāra yantrī rāḍ iti ye 'dhare prāṇās tān etābhir
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_23: dādhāra tad eṣāṃ vāvaitāḥ prāṇānāṃ vidhṛtyai samāvadbhājaḥ sādayati samāvadbhājo
GV00maitrs_pu:2629_24: hīme prāṇāḥ prāṇānāṃ vidhṛtyai yaṃ dviṣyāt tasyākṣṇayā sādayet prāṇān asya mohayati
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_0: trivṛdvatīṃ purastāt sādayati trivṛd vai yajñamukhaṃ mukhato vā etad yajñamukhaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_1: dadāti saptadaśavatīṃ dakṣiṇato 'nnaṃ vai saptadaśo 'nnaṃ vā etad dakṣiṇato dadhāti
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_2: tasmād dakṣiṇena hastenānnam adyate tasmād dakṣiṇo 'rdha ātmano vīryavattaras tasmād
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_3: dakṣiṇam ardhaṃ vayāṃsy anuparyāvartante pañcadaśavatīm uttarata ojo vai pañcadaśa
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_4: ojo vā etad uttarato dadhāty ekaviṃśavatīṃ paścāt pratiṣṭhityai trivṛdvatīṃ purastāt
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_5: sādayati trivṛd vai yajñamukhaṃ mukhato vā etad yajñamukhaṃ dadhāti pañcadaśavatīṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_6: dakṣiṇataḥ sādayati saptadaśavatīm uttarataḥ pakṣayoḥ savīryatvāyātho sāyatanatvāya
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_7: tasmād ubhābhyāṃ hastābhyām annam adyate 'tho vajro vai pañcadaśo vajreṇa vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_8: yajamāno bhrātṛvyam ubhayato nirbhajaty ekaviṃśavatīṃ paścāt pratiṣṭhityai pratiṣṭhā
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_9: hy ekaviṃśo 'rkasya vā eṣa vidhām anuvidhīyate 'nnam akro 'nnādo bhavati yasyaitā
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_10: upadhīyante 'gner bhāgo 'si dīkṣāyā ādhipatyaṃ brahma spṛtaṃ trivṛt stomā iti spṛto
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_11: vai nāmaitā iṣṭakā etābhir vai prajāpatir yadyad akāmayata tattad aspṛṇod yadyad
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_12: evaitābhir yajamānaḥ kāmayate tattat spṛṇoty ekayāstuvata prajā adhīyanteti sṛṣṭayo
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_13: vai nāmaitā iṣṭakā etābhir vai prajāpatir yadyad akāmayata tattad asṛjata yadyad
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_14: evaitābhir yajamānaḥ kāmayate tattat sṛjate agne jātān praṇudā naḥ sapatnān iti purastāt
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_15: sādayati ya eva jātāḥ sapatnās tān etayā praṇudate praty ajātān jātavedo nudasveti
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_16: paścād ya eva jātāḥ sapatnās tān etayā pratinudate tad bhrātṛvyasya vā eṣa vinodaś
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_17: catuścatvāriṃśī stomo varco draviṇam iti dakṣiṇataḥ sādayati ṣoḍaśī stomā ojo draviṇam
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_18: ity uttarataś catuścatvāriṃśadakṣarā vai triṣṭub vajras triṣṭub vajraḥ ṣoḍaśī savyāpagrahaṇo
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_19: vai vajro dakṣiṇāpraharaṇaḥ savyāpagrahaṇaṃ vā etad vajraṃ dakṣiṇāpraharaṇaṃ yajamāno
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_20: bhrātṛvyāya praharati purīṣavatīṃ madhyataḥ sādayati purīṣam iva hīdaṃ madhyataḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_21: paśoḥ purīṣaṃ madhyam ātmanaḥ sātmānam evāgniṃ cinute 'thaitā virājo vāg vai virāṭ
GV00maitrs_pu:2630_22: paśavo vā etā iṣṭakāḥ paśuṣu vā etad uttamāṃ vācaṃ dadhāti tasmāt paśumān uttamāṃ vācaṃ vadati //
GV00maitrs_pu:2631: ity uparikāṇḍe dṛṣāno nāma dvitīyaḥ prapāṭhakaḥ //MS_3,2.10//
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_0: athaitāḥ stomabhāgā etāṃ vai bṛhaspatir asurebhyo 'dhi yajñasya pratiṣṭhām āharad
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_1: yad etā upadhīyante yajñasya pratiṣṭhityai yajño vai devānām apadyata taṃ devāḥ stomabhāgābhiḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_2: pratyudastabhnuvan yad etā upadhīyante yajñasyottabdhyai prajāpatir vā etat pṛthivyā
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_3: agnes tejaḥ samabharat tad agner evaitat tejaḥ saṃbhriyate 'thaitā nākasado nākaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_4: ha vā asmā agniṃ cikyānāya bhavati na vai tatra kiṃ cana jagmuṣe kaṃ tasmān nākasado
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_5: nākasatsu pañcacūḍā adhyupadadhāti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyay eṣa ha tv eva yajamānaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_6: patnībhir agnināmuṣmiṃl loke samyaṅ yasyaitā upadhīyante 'tho madhye jyotir eva cīyata
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_7: etā vā amuṣmiṃl loke yajamānasya patnīs tasmād agnicitā strī nopetyerṣyā hi sā paścāt
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_8: prācīm uttamām upadadhāti paścād dhy etaṃ prācī patny anvāste 'thaitāḥ kḷptayaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_9: prajā asṛjata tā enaṃ sṛṣṭā atyamanyanta sa prajāpatir etā iṣṭakā apaśyat tā upādhatta
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_10: tato vā akalpata yad etā upadhīyante prajānāṃ kḷptyay athaitā vṛṣṭisanayo vṛṣṭir
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_11: vai devebhyo 'nnādyam apākrāmat tata idaṃ sarvam aśuṣyat te devāḥ prajāpatim evopādhāvan
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_12: sa prajāpatir etā iṣṭakā apaśyat tā upādhatta tebhyo vṛṣṭim annādyam avārunddha yad
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_13: etā upadhīyante vṛṣṭyā annādyasyāvaruddhyay āvapanaṃ vā uttamā citir anyāanyā iṣṭakā
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_14: upadadhāty anyānanyān evāsmai paśūn prajanayati prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇṇāyur vāyavyā
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_15: samīcī upadadhāty āyuś caiva prāṇaṃ ca sayujā akar atho samīcīnābhyāṃ hy āyuṣā ca
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_16: prāṇena ca bhuñjate prāṇo vai svayamātṛṇṇā tām uttamām upadadhāty uttamaṃ hy āyur
GV00maitrs_pu:2633_17: yad anyām uttarām upadadhyāt prāṇam asyāpidadhyāt pramāyukaḥ syāt tasmāt tām uttamām
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_0: athaiṣā chandaścitiś chandāṃsi vai devānāṃ vāmaṃ paśavaś chandāṃsy evaitayā vāmaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_1: paśūn yajamāno 'varunddha etāṃ vai yajñasenaś caitra upadadhe sa ānardha ṛdhnoti
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_2: ya etām upadhatte gāyatrībhiḥ purastāt sādayati tejo vai gāyatrī brahmavarcasaṃ teja
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_3: eva brahmavarcasam avarunddhe tisra upadadhāti trivṛd dhy agnir mūrdhanvatībhiḥ sādayati
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_4: mūrdhanyo 'sānīti triṣṭubbhir dakṣiṇata ojo vai vīryaṃ triṣṭub oja eva vīryam avarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_5: jagatībhiḥ paścād jāgatāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn evāvarunddhe 'nuṣṭubbhir uttarato 'nuṣṭub
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_6: vai sarvāṇi chandāṃsi sarvāṇy evāsya chandāṃsy upahitāni bhavanty atha paṅktīr atha
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_7: bṛhatīr athoṣṇiho 'tha kakubho 'tha virāja evam asya yathāpūrvaṃ chandāṃsy upahitāni
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_8: bhavanti dvipadā uttamāḥ sādayati dvipād yajamānaḥ pratiṣṭhityai chandāṃsi vai devānāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_9: vāmaṃ paśavo yajamānāyatanaṃ vā āhavanīyo bhrātṛvyāyatanaṃ dhiṣṇyā yat paścopadadhyād
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_10: bhrātṛvyāyatane vāmaṃ paśūn dadhyād atha yat pura upadadhāti yajamānāyatane vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_11: vāmaṃ paśūn dadhāty aṣṭopadadhāty aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī gāyatro 'gnir yāvān evāgnis taṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_12: cinute 'ṣṭau gāyatrībhiḥ purastād bahiḥpavamānasyopadadhyād yady enaṃ bhrātṛvyo 'tīva
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_13: syād ekādaśa triṣṭubbhiḥ purastān mādhyaṃdinasya pavamānasya dvādaśa jagatībhiḥ purastād
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_14: ārbhavasya pavamānasyaitā eva paścāt pavāmanānām upadadhyād yady enaṃ bhrātṛvyo 'tīva
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_15: syāt prāṇo vai pavāmāno 'gnes tejaḥ pavamānas tejasā vā etad yajamāno bhrātṛvyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_16: prabhūtaṃ praṇudate tejasā pratinudate tejasā vinudate tad bhrātṛvyasya vā eṣa vinodo
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_17: jānudaghnaṃ prathamaṃ cinvānaś cinvīta gāyatrīcitaṃ nābhidaghnaṃ dvitīyaṃ cinvānaś
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_18: cinvīta triṣṭupcitaṃ cubukadaghnaṃ tṛtīyaṃ cinvānaś cinvīta jagaccitaṃ yaj jyāyāṃsaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_19: citvā kanīyāṃsaṃ cinvīta kanīyāṃsaṃ yajñakratum upeyāt kanīyasīṃ prajāṃ kanīyasaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_20: paśūn kanīyo 'nnādyaṃ pāpīyānt syād atha yat kanīyāṃsaṃ citvā jyāyāṃsaṃ cinute jyāyāṃsam
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_21: eva yajñakratum upaiti bhūyasīṃ prajāṃ bhūyasaḥ paśūn bhūyo 'nnādyaṃ vasīyān bhavaty
GV00maitrs_pu:2634_22: eṣā vā agner uttaravatī nāma citir uttaramuttaraṃ śvaḥśvaḥ śreyān bhavati ya evaṃ veda //MS_3,3.2 //
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_0: pañcacitikaḥ kāryaḥ pāṅkto yajñaḥ pāṅktāḥ paśavas tasmāt pañcacitikaḥ pañca citayaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_1: pañca purīṣāṇi tad virājaṃ saṃpadyate tad yad virājaṃ saṃpadyate tad agneḥ stotraṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_2: kāryaṃ yat pañcacitikaḥ syād iyād virājo yad daśacitika iyād yajñāc ca paśubhyaś
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_3: ca yat pañcacitikas tena yajñāc ca paśubhyaś ca naity atha yat pañca citayaḥ pañca
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_4: purīṣāṇi tena virājo naiti tad ubhābhyāṃ vāvāsmā etad varṇābhyāṃ paśūn avarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_5: yad eṣāṃ pāṅktaṃ yac ca vairājaṃ dvyakṣaraṃ loma dvyakṣarā tvag dvyakṣaraṃ māṃsaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_6: dvyakṣaram asthi dvyakṣaro majjā tad daśa daśākṣarā virāḍ vairājāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_7: evāvarunddhe pañcacitikaḥ kārya ime vai lokās tisraś citayo yajamāno dve yajamānaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_8: vā etad eṣu lokeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayām akaḥ kā prathamā citiḥ kiṃ purīṣam ity āhur iyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_9: vāva prathamā citir oṣadhayaḥ purīṣaṃ kā dvitīyā citiḥ kiṃ purīṣam ity āhur antarikṣaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_10: vāva dvitīyā citir vayāṃsi purīṣaṃ kā tṛtīyā citiḥ kiṃ purīṣam ity āhur asau vāva
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_11: tṛtīyā citir nakṣatrāṇi purīṣaṃ kā caturthī citiḥ kiṃ purīṣam ity āhur yajño vāva
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_12: caturthī citir dakṣiṇā purīṣaṃ kā pañcamī citiḥ kiṃ purīṣam ity āhur yajamāno vāva
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_13: pañcamī citiḥ prajā purīṣam etāvad vā asti yāvad evāsti tat spṛṇoti tad avarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_14: 'thaitā ṛtavyāḥ saṃvatsaro vā agnir vaiśvānara eṣā vā agneḥ priyā tanūr yad vaiśvānaras
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_15: tasya vā ahorātrāṇy eveṣṭakā upadhīyante dvedve upadadhāti pratiṣṭhityay avakām upāsya
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_16: sādayati śāntyā anirdāhāya catasro madhyamāyāṃ cityām upadadhāty apratiṣṭhitam iva
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_17: hy antarikṣaṃ pratiṣṭhityai dvādaśopadadhāti dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaro
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_18: vā agnir vaiśvānara eṣā vā agneḥ priyā tanūr yad vaiśvānaraḥ priyāyāṃ vā etat tanvām
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_19: agniś cīyate satanūr arko nidhīyate 'gner antaḥśleṣo 'sīty etasya ha tv evāgniḥ saṃśliṣṭo
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_20: yasyaitā upadhīyante saṃśliṣṭo vā etasyāgnir yasyaitā upadhīyante kalpetāṃ dyāvāpṛthivī
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_21: iti kalpate ha vā asmā agniṃ cikyānāya pra samānānāṃ jyaiṣṭhyam āpnoti ya evaṃ veda
GV00maitrs_pu:2635_22: saṃ vā etad agnim inddhe yac cinoti taṃ dīpayaty eva ṛtavyābhiḥ //MS_3,3.3 //
GV00maitrs_pu:2636_0: tamo vai svargaṃ lokam antarā tiṣṭhaty etā vai jyotiṣmatīr iṣṭakā yad dhiraṇyaśakalaiḥ

GV00maitrs_pu:2667_2: pratitiṣṭhaty āhutīnām apratiṣṭhityā na pratitiṣṭhati yad etaṃ juhoty āhutīnāṃ pratiṣṭhityai
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_3: tāḥ pratitiṣṭhantīr yajño 'nupratitiṣṭhati yajñaṃ yajamāno 'tho kāmo vai vaiśvānaro
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_4: yatkāmo bhavati saṃ hāsmai sa kāmo namati yat prāṅ paryāvarteta daivīr viśo muhyeyur
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_5: yad dakṣiṇā yamadevatyā syād yat pratyaṅ sauryo yad udaṅ raudra ṛju hotavyaḥ pratiṣṭhityai
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_6: sarvahutaṃ karoti pratiṣṭhityai kṣatraṃ vai vaiśvānaro viṇ mārutā yad etaṃ hutvā
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_7: mārutān juhoti viśaṃ vā etat kṣatrāya niyunakty atho viśam eva kṣatrāyānukāṃ karoty
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_8: agnimukhān vai prajāpatiḥ paśūn asṛjata paśavo mārutā yad etaṃ hutvā mārutān juhoty
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_9: agnimukhān evāsmai prajāpatiḥ paśūn prajanayati saptakapālā bhavanti saptasapta mārutā
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_10: gaṇās tasmāt saptakapālā gaṇenagaṇena juhoti gaṇaśa eva marutaḥ prīṇāti yo 'raṇye
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_11: 'nuvākyo gaṇas tan madhyato juhuyāt kṣatraṃ vā eṣa marutāṃ viḍ itare viśo vā etat
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_12: kṣatraṃ madhyameṣṭhaṃ karoti yadi kāmayeta viśā kṣatraṃ hanyām iti yo 'raṇye 'nuvākyo
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_13: gaṇas tam itarair gaṇair mohayed viśā vā etat kṣatraṃ hanti yadi kāmayeta kṣatreṇa
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_14: viśaṃ hanyām iti yo 'raṇye 'nuvākyo gaṇas tenetarān gaṇān mohayet kṣatreṇa vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_15: viśaṃ hanti tasya triṣṭubhau yājyānuvākye syātām ojo vai vīryaṃ triṣṭub ojo vā etad
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_16: vīryaṃ viśa ādāya kṣatrāyāpidadhāti yadi kāmayeta kṣatreṇāsya kṣatraṃ hanyāṃ pra
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_17: svād āyatanāc cyaveteti yo 'raṇye 'nuvākyo gaṇas tenāgniṣṭhaṃ rathavāhanaṃ vyaṅgayet
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_18: kṣatraṃ vā eṣa marutām agniṣṭhaṃ rathavāhanaṃ kṣatriyasya kṣatraṃ bibharti kṣatreṇaivāsya
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_19: kṣatraṃ hanti pra svād āyatanāc cyavata indraṃ daivīr viśo maruto 'nuvartmānā ity
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_20: etad vai devānām anuvartma daivīṃ ca vāvāsmā etad viśaṃ mānuṣīṃ cānuvartmānau karoti
GV00maitrs_pu:2667_21: saṃ vā etad agnim inddhe yac cinoti taṃ dīpayaty eva mārutaiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:2668: ity uparikāṇḍe stomabhāgo nāma tṛtīyaḥ prapāṭhakaḥ //MS_3,3.10//
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_0: vasor dhārāṃ juhoty akḷptasya kḷptyā aśāntasya śāntyā anabhijitasyābhijityā anavaruddhasyāvaruddhyai
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_1: saṃtataṃ juhoti prāṇānāṃ saṃtatyā eṣāṃ lokānāṃ saṃtatyā annādyasya saṃtatyay avichinnaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_2: juhoty annādyasyāvichedāya yad vichindyāt prāṇān vichindyād yaṃ dviṣyāt tasya vichindyād
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_3: annādyam asya vichinatty akṣuc cānnaṃ cety etāni vā annasya rūpāṇi rūpair evānnam
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_4: avarunddhe 'gniś cāpaś cety eṣā vā annasya yoniḥ sayony evānnam avarunddhe vasor
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_5: me dhārāsad iti vasordhārāṃ juhoti ghṛtasya vā eṣā dhārā yajamānam amuṣmiṃl loka
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_6: upatiṣṭhante dvādaśa dvādaśāti juhoti dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram evāvarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_7: 'rdhendrāṇi juhoty ardhendrair vai devā indriyaṃ vīryam asurāṇām avṛñjatendriyam
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_8: evaitair vīryaṃ yajamāno bhrātṛvyasya vṛṅkte devāś ca vā asurāś cāspardhanta te devā
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_9: indram abruvaṃs tvayā mukhenemān jayāmeti so 'bravīd bhāgo me 'stv iti vṛṇīṣvety
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_10: abruvan so 'bravīd ardhyo vā ahaṃ devatānām asānīti tato vā ajayaṃs tasmād eṣo 'rdhabhāg
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_11: devatānāṃ yad ardhendrāṇi hūyante vijityaīndrottamāni bhavantīndriyaṃ vai vīryam
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_12: indra indriye vā etad vīrye tato yajñasya yajamānaḥ pratitiṣṭhaty aṃśuś ca raśmiś
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_13: ceti yajñamukhaṃ vā aṃśuś ca raśmiś ca yajñamukham evāvarunddhe 'dhipatiś cādābhyaś
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_14: ceti nainaṃ bhrātṛvyo dabhnoty agniṃ cikyānaṃ pra samānānāṃ jyaiṣṭhyam āpnoti ya
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_15: evaṃ vedaite grahā bhavanty etāni vai yajñasya rūpāṇi rūpair eva yajñam avarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_16: srucaś ca camasāś ceti yajñāyudhāni saṃbharati yajñāyudhāny eva saṃbhṛtya yajñaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_17: prayuṅkte pātrāṇi juhoti pātrair vā annam adyate 'nurūpeṇaivānnādyam avarunddhe barhiś
GV00maitrs_pu:2670_18: ca vediś cety āśīr evaiṣāvabhṛthaś ca svagākāraś ceti pratiṣṭhityai //MS_3,4.1 //
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_0: agniś ca gharmaś cety etad vā agner brahmavarcasyaṃ rucaṃ caivaitena brahmavarcasaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_1: cāvarunddhe tejasvī brahmavarcasī bhavaty ṛtuś ca vrataṃ cety ahorātre vā ṛtuś ca
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_2: vrataṃ cāhorātre evāsyaitenābhīṣṭe prīte bhavata ekā ca tisraś ceti devachandasaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_3: vā ekā ca tisraś ca devachandasam evāvarunddhe catasraś cāṣṭau ceti manuṣyachandasaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_4: vai catasraś cāṣṭau ca manuṣyachandasam evāvarunddhe devaloka eva devachandasena
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_5: ṛdhnoti manuṣyaloke manuṣyachandasenaikā ca tisraś ca catasraś cāṣṭau ceti roho vā
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_6: eṣa eṣāṃ lokānāṃ saṃkrāntiḥ svargasya lokasya dvyuttareṇa vai stomenādityāḥ svargaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_7: lokam āyaṃś caturuttareṇāṅgirasau yad etau stomau juhoti svargasya lokasya samaṣṭyai
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_8: yugmadayujau vā etau somau mithunau prajananāya reta eva dvyuttareṇa dadhāti reto
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_9: hitaṃ caturuttareṇa prajanayaty ekā ca tisraś cety ā trayastriṃśatas trayastriṃśad
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_10: devatās tā evāsyaitenābhīṣṭāḥ pītā bhavanti catasraś cāṣṭau cety aṣṭācatvāriṃśato
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_11: 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśadakṣarā jagatī jāgatāḥ paśavaḥ paśūn evāvarunddhe tryaviś ca tryavī
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_12: cety etāni vai vayāṃsi paśūnāṃ paśava eva paśūn avarunddha āyur yajñena kalpate prāṇo
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_13: yajñena kalpatā iti yajñasya vā eṣā kḷptir yajñam evaitad acīkḷpad vājāya svāhā prasavāya
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_14: svāheti trayodaśa vā etā āhutayas trayodaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaraṃ vāvāsmā
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_15: etad upadadhāti svarge loke tasminn eva pratitiṣṭhati stomaś ca yajuś cety annaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_16: vai stomaś ca yajuś cānnaṃ vā etad ātman dhitvānnādo bhūtvā devakṣetram antataḥ prāvasaty
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_17: agnir vai vasus tasya vā eṣā dhārā sarvān ha vā asmā agnir dohānt sarvān kāmān duhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2671_18: ya evaṃ veda saṃ vā etad agnir annādyam inddhe yac cinoti taṃ dīpayaty eva vasor
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_0: vājaprasavyaṃ juhoti vājaṃ vā etenāgnir annādyam udajayad vājam evaitenānnādyaṃ yajamānā
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_1: ujjayaty annasyānnasya juhoti vājaprasavyābhir annaṃ vai vājo 'nnādyasyāvaruddhyay
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_2: ubhayaṃ grāmyaṃ cāraṇyaṃ ca juhoty ubhayasyānnādyasyāvaruddhayay audumbareṇa sruveṇa
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_3: juhoty ūrg vā udumbara ūrjo 'varuddhyai devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_4: pūṣṇo hastābhyāṃ sarasvatyā vācā yantur yantreṇa bṛhaspatiṃ sāmrājyāyābhiṣiñcāmīty
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_5: abhiṣiñced yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bṛhaspatisavo hy eṣa indraṃ sāmrājyāyābhiṣiñcāmīty
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_6: abhiśiñced yadi rājanyo yajetendrasavo hy eṣa kṛṣṇājine brahmavarcasakāmam abhiṣiñced
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_7: brahmaṇo vā etad ṛksāmayo rūpam ṛksāme brahmavarcasaṃ brahmavarcasam evāvarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_8: bastājine paśukāmaṃ paśavo vai bastājinaṃ paśūn evāvarunddhe sūyate vā eṣo 'gnīnāṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_9: yaś cīyate svenaivainaṃ savena samardhayati devā oṣadhīṣu pakvāsv ājīm ayus tā agnir
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_10: udajayad agner vā eṣo 'bhiṣeko 'nnasya vā etat sūyate savānāṃ vā eṣa eko bṛhaspatisavo
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_11: vā eṣa bārhaspatyo brāhmaṇo devatayā svenaiva savena sūyate tad āhur hotavyam eva
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_12: na hi suṣuvāṇaḥ kaṃ cana pratyavarohatīti suṣuvāṇo vā eṣa devatayā yo 'gnicid ṛtavo
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_13: vai suṣuvāṇasya rāṣṭram anubibhrati ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtavo rāṣṭrabhṛto yat ṣaḍbhir juhoty
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_14: ṛtuṣv evāsya rāṣṭraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati te 'smai rāṣṭram anubibhrati dvādaśagṛhītena
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_15: juhoti dvādaśa māsāḥ saṃvatsaraḥ saṃvatsaram evāptvāvarunddhe mithunā vā etā āhutayas
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_16: tasmai svāhā vaṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā vaḍ iti tasminn eva mithune reto dadhāti rathaśīrṣe
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_17: saptamaṃ juhoti diśām abhijityai diśa evābhijitā rathena jīyante 'thaite vātahomā
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_18: agnicito vā amutrāhorātre agnicite 'yaṃ vāyuḥ pavate prāṇo vai vāyuḥ prāṇam evāvarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_19: 'ñjalinā juhoti na hy etasyāvadānam asty atho parigṛhītyā eva prāṇo vai vāyur hastaḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_20: prāṇāyopakḷptatamas tasmād añjalinā juhoti trir juhoti trayo vā ime lokā ima evāsmai
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_21: lokā vātaṃ dhunvanti samudro 'si nabhasvān ārdradānur ity etāni vai vāyo rūpāṇi rūpair
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_22: eva vāyum avarunddhe māruto 'si marutāṃ gaṇa iti māruto hi vāyuḥ saṃ vā etad agnim
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_23: inddhe yac cinoti taṃ dīpayaty eva vātahomaiḥ prāṇo vai gāyatrī gāyatraṃ havirdhānam
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_24: apāno jagatī jāgataṃ sado vyānas triṣṭup traiṣṭubham āgnīdhram asuḥ pṛśnir madhye
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_25: divyo nihitaḥ pṛśnir aśmeti amuṃ vāvāsyaitan madhyataḥ prāṇāpānānāṃ vyavadadhāti
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_26: prāṇānāṃ dhṛtyay aśmanavamā āgnīdhre sādayati nava vai prāṇāḥ prāṇān vāvāsyaitad
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_27: yajamānaloke dadhāty ekaviṃśatiṃ hotriye pratiṣṭhityai pratiṣṭhā hy ekaviṃśa ekādaśa
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_28: brāhmaṇāñśaṃsya ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭub vīryaṃ tirṣṭub vīrya eva pratitiṣṭhaty aṣṭāṣṭā
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_29: itareṣv aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī brahma gāyatrī brahmaṇy eva pratitiṣṭhati ṣaṇ mārjālīye
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_30: ṣaḍ vā ṛtava ṛtavo vā etaṃ dakṣiṇataḥ paryaharanta pitaro vā ṛtavo 'tho ṣaḍ vai chandāṃsi
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_31: chandāṃsi vāvāsyaitad yajñamukhe yunakti sajūr abdo āyavobhir ity etā vā agner devatāḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_32: purastādbhāgās tā eva prīṇāty atho atra vai devānāṃ priyās tanvas tā evāvarunddhe
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_33: sajūr abdo āyavobhir iti saṃvatsaro vā abda ṛtavā āyavānaḥ saṃvatsara evāsyaitenā
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_34: ṛtavo 'bhīṣṭāḥ prītā bhavanti sajūr uṣā āruṇībhir ity uṣasam eva prīṇāti sajoṣā aśvinā
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_35: daṃsobhir ity ahorātre vā aśvināhorātre evāsyaitenābhīṣṭe prīte bhavataḥ sajūḥ sūrā
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_36: etaśeneti sūryam eva prīṇāti sajūr vaiśvānara iḍayā ghṛtena svāheti saṃvatsaro vai
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_37: vaiśvānaraḥ paśavā iḍā paśavo ghṛtaṃ saṃvatsarā evāsyaitena paśavo 'bhīṣṭāḥ prītā
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_38: bhavanti darbhastambe juhoty eṣā vā asyāmṛtacit tanūr amṛte vā etad agniś cīyate
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_39: hiraṇyaṃ nidhāya juhoty agnimaty eva juhoty āyatanavaty andho 'dhvaryuḥ syād yad
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_40: anāyatane juhuyāt svargāya vai lokāya devarahatho yujyate kāmāya manuṣyaratho 'gniṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_41: yunajmi śavasā ghṛtenety agniṃ vā etad yunakti tena yuktena svargaṃ lokaṃ gachati
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_42: yat sarvābhir yuñjyād yukto 'sya yajñaḥ syād apratiṣṭhitā āhutayo dvābhyāṃ nāpiyunakty
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_43: āhutīnāṃ pratiṣṭhityai tāḥ pratitiṣṭhantīr yajño 'nupratitiṣṭhati yajñaṃ yajamānas
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_44: tisṛbhir yunakti trivṛd dhy agnir yāvān evāgnis taṃ yunakti tasmin yukte sarvaṃ havyaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_45: samādhīyate pañcabhir yunakti pāṅkto yajño yāvān eva yajñas tam ālabdha saṃ vā etam
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_46: etau tapato yaś cīyate yaś ca vaiśvānaro yad apsumatībhyāṃ purastād yajñāyajñiyasya
GV00maitrs_pu:2673_47: saṃmṛśati śāntyay eṣā vai yajñasya mātrā yad agniṣṭomo bhūma tv evāsyāta ūrdhvaṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_0: yo vā agniṃ yogā āgate na yuṅkte na yuñjāneṣu yuṅkte 'gne yukṣvā hi ye tavety agniṃ
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_1: vā etad yogā āgate yuṅkte yuṅkte yuñjāneṣu yo vā agniṃ vimoka āgate na vimuñcate
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_2: na vimuñcamāneṣu vimuñcate vi te muñcāmi raśanāṃ vi raśmīn ity agniṃ vā etad vimoka
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_3: āgate vimuñcate vi muñcamāneṣu muñcate yathā vai punarādheyam evaṃ punaścitir yo
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_4: vā ādheyena ṛdhnoti punaḥ sa ādhatte yo 'gniṃ cikyāno manyeta vi syā ṛdhyatā iti
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_5: sa etāṃ punaścitim upadahītāpi prathamaṃ cinvānaś cinvītā ṛddhyay ṛdhnoty evātho
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_6: mithunatvāya yāṃ vā agnicid aniṣṭakā āhutiṃ juhoti sravati sā tāṃ sravantīṃ yajño
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_7: 'nusravati yajñaṃ yajamāno yad etāṃ punaścitim upadadhāty āhutīnāṃ pratiṣṭhityai
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_8: tāḥ pratitiṣṭhantīr yajño 'nu pratitiṣṭhati yajñaṃ yajamāno 'ṣṭopadadhāty aṣṭākṣarā
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_9: gāyatrī gāyatro 'gnir yāvān evāgnis taṃ cinute 'ṣṭau lokaṃpṛṇā upadhāya purīṣeṇābhy·haty
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_10: aṣṭākṣarā gāyatrī brahma gāyatrī gāyatryaivainaṃ chandasā brahmaṇā cinuta ekādaśa
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_11: lokaṃpṛṇā upadhāya purīṣeṇābhy·haty ekādaśākṣarā triṣṭubvīryaṃ triṣṭubhaivainaṃ chandasā
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_12: vīryeṇa cinute dvādaśa lokaṃpṛṇā upadhāya purīṣeṇābhy·hati dvādaśākṣarā jagatī jāgatāḥ
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_13: paśavo jagatyaivainaṃ chandasā paśubhiś cinuta eṣā vā agner uttaravedir etad agnir
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_14: uttaravedimāṃś cīyate yo 'syāgniḥ purā citaḥ syāt tam anvavasāya yajeta yathā vā
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_15: idaṃ dīpyamāne bhūyo 'bhyādadhāty evaṃ vāvāsminn etad abhipūrvaṃ bhūyas tejo dadhāti
GV00maitrs_pu:2674_16: tad āhuḥ kaḥ śreyāṃsaṃ viṣuptaṃ bodhayiṣyatīti yad yajatā āhutyaivainaṃ vyardhayati

GV00maitrs_pu:5899: ugraṃ paśyed rāṣṭabhṛt kilbiṣāni yad akṣavṛttam anudattam etat /
GV00maitrs_pu:5900: nem na ṛṇān ṛṇavān īpsamāno yamasya loke nidhir ajarāya //
GV00maitrs_pu:5902: imaṃ me varuṇa śrudhī havam adyā ca mṛḍaya /
GV00maitrs_pu:5904: tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānas tad āśāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:5905: aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhy uruśaṃsa mā nā āyuḥ pramoṣīḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:5906: ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya /
GV00maitrs_pu:5907: athā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma //
GV00maitrs_pu:5908: ava te heḍo varuṇa namobhir ava yajñebhir īmahe havirbhiḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:5909: kṣayann asmabhyam asura pracetā rājann enāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni //
GV00maitrs_pu:5910: tvaṃ no agne varuṇasya vidvān devasya heḍo 'vayāsisīṣṭhāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:5911: yajiṣṭho vahnitamaḥ śośucāno viśvā dveṣāṃsi pramumugdhy asmat //
GV00maitrs_pu:5912: sa tvaṃ no agne 'vamo bhavotī nediṣṭho asyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau /
GV00maitrs_pu:5913: avayakṣva no varuṇaṃ rarāṇo vīhi mṛḍīkaṃ suhavo na edhi //
GV00maitrs_pu:5914: saṃkasuko vikasuko nirṛto yaś ca nisvanaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:5915: te 'smad yakṣmam anāgaso dūrād dūram acīcatam //
GV00maitrs_pu:5916: nir yakṣmam acīcate kṛtyāṃ nirṛtiṃ cakāra /
GV00maitrs_pu:5917: tena yo 'smat samṛchātai tam asmai prasuvāmasi //
GV00maitrs_pu:5919: tena yo 'smat samṛchātai tam asmai prasuvāmasi //
GV00maitrs_pu:5920: saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhir aganmahi manasā saṃ śivena /
GV00maitrs_pu:5921: tvaṣṭā sudatro vidadhātu rāyo 'nu no mārṣṭu tanvo yad viriṣṭam //MS_4,14.17//
GV00maitrs_pu:5922: śucī vo havyā marutaḥ śucīnāṃ śuciṃ hinomy adhvaraṃ śucibhyaḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:5923: ṛtena satyam ṛtasāpa āyañ śucijanmānaḥ śucayaḥ pāvakāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:5925: aṃseṣv ā marutaḥ khādayo vo vakṣaḥsu rukmā upaśiśriyāṇāḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:5926: vi vidyuto na vṛṣṭibhī rucānā anu svadhām āyudhair yachamānāḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:5928: ime turaṃ maruto rāmayantīme sahaḥ sahasā ānamanti /
GV00maitrs_pu:5929: ime śaṃsaṃ vanuṣyato nipānti guru dveṣo araruṣe dadhanti //
GV00maitrs_pu:5930: arā ived acaramā aheva praprajāyante akavā mahobhiḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:5931: pṛśneḥ putrā upamāso rabhiṣṭhāḥ svayā matyā marutaḥ saṃmimikṣuḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:5934: agnīṣomā yo adya vām idaṃ vacaḥ saparyati /
GV00maitrs_pu:5935: tasmai dhattaṃ suvīryaṃ gavāṃ poṣaṃ svaśvyam //
GV00maitrs_pu:5936: ānyaṃ divo mātariśvā jabhārāmathnād anyaṃ pari śyeno adreḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:5937: agnīṣomā brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānoruṃ yajñāya cakrathur ulokam //
GV00maitrs_pu:5938: agnīṣomā ya āhutiṃ yo vāṃ dāśād dhaviṣkṛtim /
GV00maitrs_pu:5939: sa prajayā suvīryaṃ viśvam āyur vyaśnavat //
GV00maitrs_pu:5940: agnīṣomā haviṣaḥ prasthitasya vītaṃ haryataṃ vṛṣaṇā juṣethām /
GV00maitrs_pu:5941: suśarmāṇā svavasā hi bhūtam athā dhattaṃ yajamānāya śaṃ yoḥ //
GV00maitrs_pu:5942: ā carṣaṇiprā vṛṣabho janānāṃ rājā kṛṣṭīnāṃ puruhūta indraḥ /
GV00maitrs_pu:5943: stutaḥ śravasyann avasopa madrig yuktvā harī vṛṣaṇāyāhy arvāk //
GV00maitrs_pu:5945: taṃ sadhrīcīr ūtayo vṛṣṇyāni pauṃsyāni niyutaḥ saścur indram /
GV00maitrs_pu:5946: samudraṃ na sindhava ukthaśuṣmā uruvyacasaṃ girā āviśanti //
GV00maitrs_pu:5947: satyam it tan na tvāvaṃ anyo 'stīndra devo na martyo jyāyān /
GV00maitrs_pu:5948: ahann ahiṃ pariśayānam arṇo 'vāsṛjo apo achā samudram //
GV00maitrs_pu:5951: sa śevṛdham adhidhā dyumnam asme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḍ indra tavyam /
GV00maitrs_pu:5952: rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ //MS_4,14.18//
